greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of (n-1)n(n+1)/12.
comment: Proof of 4-periodicity follows from evaluating (n+3)(n+4)(n+5)/12, subtracting (n-1)n(n+1)/12 and getting n^2+4n+5 which is an integer. - _R. J. Mathar_, Mar 07 2008
mathematica: Table[(n^3-n)/12,{n,120}]//Denominator (* or *) PadRight[{},120,{1,2,1,1}] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 15 2019 *)
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Mar 04 2008
